item.title: MATH 112 – Final Exam Practice #3
item.description: How to use this page Try each problem first, then expand Hint or Solution as needed. Formulas Provided on the Exam {: #formula-sheet } Quadratic Formula Vertex of Parabola Factored Forms \(x = \dfrac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^{2}-4ac}}{2a}\) \(x = -\dfrac{b}{2a}\) \(y = a(x-p)(x-q)\) \(y = a(x-h)^2 + k\) \(y = a(x-r_1)(x-r_2)\) Exponential / Logarithmic Compound Interest \(A = P\!\left(1+\dfrac{r}{n}\right)^{nt}\) \(A = Pe^{rt}\) \(\log_b x = \dfrac{\ln x}{\ln b}\) Problems 1 Sales‑Tax Expression {: #q1 } In a certain city, sales tax is 9 %.
